channel.title: JBoss Issue Tracker
channel.description: This file is an XML representation of an issue

item.title: [ENTESB-5941] camel-sql is missing spring-tx dependency
item.description:
Trying to create a JDBC based idempotent consumer, and the deployment fails with a 

ClassNotFoundException for org/springframework/transaction/support/TransactionCallback.

Packaging the dependency in the app by adding org.springframework.tx does not help.

This jar is also available as a module in EAP_HOME /system/layers/fuse/org/springframework/tx, though it's declared as private.Tried to set an explicit dependency using both the MANIFEST.MF method and the jboss-deployment-structure.xml method https://access.redhat.com/documentation/en-US/JBoss_Enterprise_Application_Platform/6.4/html/Development_Guide/Add_an_Explicit_Module_Dependency_to_a_Deployment1.html.

The dependencies does not seem to take any effect.

status.description: A resolution has been taken, and it is awaiting verification by reporter. From here issues are either reopened, or are closed.

comments.comment: Duplicates ENTESB-4214

customfieldvalues.customfieldvalue:
• Attached is a test reproducer.
  • Build the reproducer, 'mvn clean package' or 'mvn clean install' and deploy on EAP.

• For a workaround of this issue, need to add the module dependency,

 <module name="org.springframework.tx"/>

to
jboss-eap- 6.4/modules/system/layers/fuse/org/apache/camel/component/sql/main/module.xml and restart the EAP server.
